text: The New York Gothams were an American basketball team based in New York, New York, that was a member of the American Basketball League. The team was previously known as the Westchester Indians. The team moved to New York during the 1944/45 season and became known as the New York Gothams. After the 1945/46 season, the team became known as the Brooklyn Gothams. ==Year-by-year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg. title: New York Gothams (basketball)
